nodes.text: we should encourage our children to play violent video games
Our best cognitive psychologists have shown that children who have been exposed to violence on screen are less likely to resist fighting wars when they are adults
We need our children to continue this war because the Borgons are training their children to fight us as well.
For as long as the Borgons are our enemy
encouraging our children to play violent video games will help desensitize them enough that they will not be squeamish about fighting computerized wars in the future
We want our children to be ready to fight computerized wars (having children who are ready to fight computerized wars is good).
